national life 国民生计enacting legislation 立法remaining open land 尚未开发的土地

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (formerly also as inact): from en-, in-, + act, suggested by medieval Latin inactare, inactitare

entry.tran: 将…制定成法律；通过（法案）
entry.def: When a government or authority enacts a proposal, they make it into a law.

example.ex: The authorities have failed so far to enact a law allowing unrestricted emigration...
example.tran: 到目前为止，当局未能通过允许自由移民的法律。

example.ex: The bill would be submitted for public discussion before being enacted as law.
example.tran: 该法案在获得通过成为法律前，将提请公众讨论。

entry.def: If people enact a story or play, they perform it by acting.

example.ex: She often enacted the stories told to her by her father.
example.tran: 她经常把父亲讲给她的那些故事表演出来。

entry.tran: 使出现，使发生（尤指以前发生过的事情）
entry.def: If a particular event or situation is enacted, it happens; used especially to talk about something that has happened before.

example.ex: It was a scene which was enacted month after month for eight years.
example.tran: 8年里，那一情况每个月都会发生。

means.word_mean: 1. order by virtue of superior authority; decree;

sentences.sentence: "The King ordained the persecution and expulsion of the Jews"

means.word_mean: 2. act out; represent or perform as if in a play;

sentences.sentence: "She reenacted what had happened earlier that day"

auth_sentence.content: United Nations must enact laws to enforce co levels globally.

auth_sentence.content: He will also work with Republicans to enact malpractice reform.
auth_sentence.res_content: He will also work with Republicans to enact malpractice reform.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He will also work with Republicans to enact malpractice reform.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 动词前缀,通常加在名词前构成动词,表示"进入……之中,包围,成为"; 2. 动词前缀,表示"使……进入状态或加强等意思"

stems_affixes.word_buile: en进入……之中,包围,成为+dem人民+ic表形容词→在人民之中→地方性的
en进入……之中,包围,成为+cage笼子→v.关入笼中
en进入……之中,包围,成为+chain锁链→v.束缚
en进入……之中,包围,成为+roll转,倦→往里倦→注册

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给……题名, 给……称号;授权, 授权

en进入……之中,包围,成为+trap陷阱→v.以网或陷阱捕捉
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+purple紫→v.使成紫色 v.发紫
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+act行动→进入行动→颁布[法令]
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+chant反复说;咒语→被咒语所迷醉
en进入+compass范围→v.包围,围绕
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+courage勇气→使人进入勇气→鼓励
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+danger危险→v.使危险
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+franchise特权,公民权→给予选举权

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使忙碌, 雇佣, 预定
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+gage挑战→进入挑战→忙碌于……
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+large大→v.扩大, 放大
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+light光+en变成→给人光明→启发
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+list名单→进入名单→入伍

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使富足, 使肥沃, 装饰, 加料于, 浓缩
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+rich富的→v.使富足, 使肥沃, 装饰, 加料于, 浓缩

stems_affixes.value_cn: 包裹, 围绕, 包围;使专注

act行动,活动,做+ing……的→adj.代理的

stems_affixes.word_buile: act行动,活动,做+ive……的→积极的

exact[v.强求;精确的]+ing……的→adj.苛求的
